document.title: SumNL-samenvattingencorpus
document.intro: The SumNL Corpus of Summaries is based on 30 clusters. Each cluster consists of a subject and 5-25 newspaper articles who are relevant to that subject. Two summaries (of different size) were made for each cluster and also extracts which consist of ten sentences from the texts. Summaries

access.title: available for non-commercial and commercial organisations;  user licence required
